University of Rome Tor Vergata: Tor Vergata University of Rome, also known as the University of Tor Vergata (Italian: Universit√† degli Studi di Roma "Tor Vergata"), is a public research university located in Rome, Italy.[4] Located in the southeastern suburb of Rome, the university combines a liberal arts tradition with emphasis on career orientation in the field of Economics, Engineering, Mathematics and Physics, Natural Sciences, and Medicine.[5]
